original_text: Now the upper chambers were shorter: for the galleries were higher than these, than the lower, and than the middlemost of the building.
korean_text: 그 위층의 방은 가장 좁으니 이는 회랑들로 말미암아 아래층과 가운데 층보다 위층이 더 줄어짐이라

sentences.original_text: Now the upper chambers were shorter
for the galleries were higher than these
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 회랑들이 이것들보다 더 높았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and than the middlemost of the building
